Class EmbeddingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • affective.core.EmbeddingHandler

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVEmbeddingHandler
    public abstract class EmbeddingHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler
    This abstract class is used for handling word vector or embeddings.
